name: KEMONO FRIENDS PICROSS
description:
Picross now has KEMONO FRIENDS!

Now you can make dot pictures of cute Friends.

There are 300 Picross and Mega-Picross puzzles!

Plus Clip Picross, where you solve puzzle pieces to complete an image.

Help functions and tutorials to help new players.

Friends will appear in the Gallery when you clear a puzzle.

Mimamori Friends watch over your progress in the corner of the screen.

KEMONO FRIENDS PICROSS, filled with the world of KEMONO FRIENDS! Give it
a try!

*Not compatible with the Touch Screen.
